pli-tv-pvr7:1.26: [Sp.5.321](): _Desitā gaṇanūpagā nāma yā dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā puna na āpajjissāmīti desitā hoti. Agaṇanūpagā nāma yā dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā saussāheneva cittena aparisuddhena desitā hoti. Ayañhi desitāpi desitagaṇanaṃ na upeti. Aṭṭhame vatthusmiṃ bhikkhuniyā pārājikameva hoti_, “_Desitā gaṇanūpagā_ means cases where, having given up one’s duty, one confesses, saying, ‘I will not commit again.’ _Agaṇanūpagā_ means cases where, not having given up one’s duty, one confesses with an impure mind that is still effective. ”
